name: FACEPUNCHER64
description:
Stick with it! It's Unity's WebGL*, so it could take a minute to load!

Source - Wallpaper & Art (coming soon)

WTF am I even doing?

Hit arrow keys to start.

A #LOWREZJAM GAME ABOUT LAMPING MUNTERS

Watch the face, it animates in a random order! When it's done, press the ARROW KEYS in that order.

  • LEFT EYE is the LEFT ARROW KEY
  • RIGHT EYE is the RIGHT ARROW KEY
  • NOSE is the UP ARROW KEY
  • MOUTH is the DOWN ARROW KEY.

Do it quicker and quicker and see how many faces you punch.

.

.

.

What is this, why am I here?

A game slapped together for LOWREZJAM 2016 (hosted by Devi Ever)

By Daisy Spiers & Jamie Lewis

Special thanks to Dan Emmerson, for some great, disturbing faces, and Adam Child, for unequivocal programming help.

Also thanks to AtlasBlue for the use of his Tetris Drums loop

*WebGL is shit.

.

.

.

Other stuff

The project source is here. If you're learning to make games and stuff, consider this part of your research. If you found it useful please don't hesitate to give us a tweet!
